Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController

Class ScoreBoardController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController.GUIScene
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ui.gui.FXController.ScoreBoardController
public class ScoreBoardController extends GUIScene
ScoreBoardController allows to check the current scores displayed on the physical game scoreboard. It also displays the leaderboard.
